leader.role: Team Lead — Orchestrates the entire team with per-phase reporting
leader.when_to_call: Complex tasks that need multiple agents. User approves each phase before proceeding.
leader.output: Delegates tasks to specialized agents, reports per phase, manages QA loop (max 3 retries)

qa_loop.on_failure: Call meta-thinker + planner to rethink approach
qa_loop.on_max_retries: Stop and report to Manager with detailed failure analysis

quickstart.role: Autopilot — Fully automated project build from idea to production
quickstart.when_to_call: Quick MVPs, prototypes, or when user wants zero-approval fast build
quickstart.output: Complete project with QA, security audit, docs. Final report with all results.

qa_loop.on_failure: Call meta-thinker + planner to rethink approach
qa_loop.on_max_retries: Log unresolved bug, continue with remaining work

planner.role: Analyzes requirements, writes PRD, breaks down tasks
planner.when_to_call: New features, project kickoff, requirement analysis
planner.output: PRD.md, task breakdown, user stories, estimation

architect.when_to_call: Database schema, API design, system diagrams, tech decisions

designer.when_to_call: UI components, color palette, typography, wireframes, responsive design

frontend-dev.role: Frontend Developer — Component, Layout, State Management
frontend-dev.when_to_call: React/Vue/Tailwind components, pages, state logic, responsive layout
frontend-dev.output: Components, pages, hooks, styles, state management code

backend-dev.role: Backend Developer — API, DB Queries, Business Logic
backend-dev.when_to_call: API endpoints, database queries, authentication, server logic
backend-dev.output: API routes, controllers, models, middleware, services

mobile-dev.when_to_call: Mobile screens, native features, navigation, app store deployment
mobile-dev.output: React Native/Expo screens, navigation config, native module setup

devops.when_to_call: Docker setup, CI/CD pipelines, deployment, cloud config
devops.output: Dockerfile, docker-compose.yml, GitHub Actions, deploy scripts

qa-engineer.role: QA — Index-First Testing, Edge Cases, Security, Performance, Bug Reporting
qa-engineer.when_to_call: Test writing, test automation, performance testing, bug triage
qa-engineer.output: Test suites, coverage reports, bug reports with scoped routing

security-engineer.when_to_call: Security audit, vulnerability scan, OWASP check, secret detection
security-engineer.output: Security report, vulnerability list, fix recommendations

tech-writer.when_to_call: README, API docs, user guides, changelog

seo-specialist.when_to_call: Meta tags, Schema.org, sitemap, performance, Core Web Vitals
seo-specialist.output: SEO audit report, meta tag fixes, schema markup

meta-thinker.when_to_call: Brainstorming, product vision, monetization, competitive analysis
meta-thinker.output: Idea reports, strategy docs, competitor analysis

knowledge-guide.role: Code Explainer, Note Taker, Handoff Specialist
knowledge-guide.when_to_call: Explain codebase to new team members, capture notes, handoff docs
knowledge-guide.output: Code explanations, handoff documents, context summaries

code-reviewer.role: Code Reviewer — Automated code quality review
code-reviewer.when_to_call: Code quality check, naming review, security scan, performance audit
code-reviewer.output: Review report with issues (critical/warning/info) and quality score (A-F)

release-manager.role: Release Manager — Changelog, versioning, release notes
release-manager.when_to_call: Version bump, changelog generation, release preparation, tagging
release-manager.output: CHANGELOG.md, version bump, release notes, git tags

researcher.role: Researcher — Market analysis, web search, trend discovery
researcher.when_to_call: Research competitors, validate ideas, discover trends, find best practices, gather information
researcher.output: research_report.md, market-analysis.md, competitor data, web search results

infrastructure.context-router: Universal data query router — use before reading raw data files. Saves tokens by returning only matching entries.
infrastructure.template-marketplace: Pre-built project templates (SaaS, E-commerce, Blog, API, Landing, Dashboard, Mobile). Used by quickstart and leader.
infrastructure.phase-context: .agent/brain/phase_context.md — shared context board updated by leader after each phase. ALL agents must read this before starting work.
